entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @MollyJongFast Can we have a REAL Coronavirus Task Force put together, please?  Bypass the human q-tip, the vampire, and the dementor, and maybe even leave out Scarlet O’Scarfa.  But bring back Fauci, and whomever Biden has on his short list of SCIENTISTS to lead us through this.
